article_title: State Laws Put Focus on Hot-Button Issues
article_text:
Statehouses across the nation have taken steps to raise the minimum wage in the new year, along with passing hundreds of other laws on hot-button issues like marijuana use, voter ID requirements, gun control and mandatory American-flag displays in the classroom.

On the federal level, the beginning of the new year marks the start of coverage under the Affordable Care Act. It also is when jobless benefits expire for 1.3 million...
